        public static boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String pass)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true is the password is in the correct format, else return false

      • validateEmail

        public static boolean validateEmail(java.lang.String email)
        Check that the email is in the correct format and belongs to current undergraduates (intake 2010 - 2014). Only undergraduates under current schools (i.e.: sis, law, business, socsc, accountancy, or economics)
        Parameters:
        email - the email within the file belonging to each user
        Returns:
        true if the email is in the correct format and belongs to current undergraduates, else return false
